-------------

-------------
你現在有 無限 箭矢, 炸彈, 染色, 附魔, 錢幣, 劍油充能, 藥劑, 和藥劑持續時間.
Ignore this setting.  It is here just to show the message in the menu. ;NOTE: That needs to be translated too.
